summary: Step 10 smoke test checklist file was added and ROLLOUT_STEPS.md was updated to include a Step 10 section with references to the new checklist. However, the diff evidence does not show the required "Next Step to Execute" section being advanced, and the smoke-test checklist evidence is truncated before confirming full coverage (all five routes + opening Edit Links dialog for both roles). Additionally, unrequested metadata/state files were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update `frontend/ROLLOUT_STEPS.md` so the "Next Step to Execute" section advances from Step 9.5 to Step 10 (Deployment and Launch), with clear English instructions and references to relevant checklists/log templates.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided excerpt of `frontend/ROLLOUT_STEPS.md` shows a "Remaining Steps" section with "Step 10 â€” Deployment and Launch" and references, but it does not show any "Next Step to Execute" section or explicit advancement of that section from Step 9.5 to Step 10. With truncated content, this specific required section/wording cannot be verified.
evidence: frontend/ROLLOUT_STEPS.md (truncated excerpt shows Step 10 under "Remaining Steps" but no "Next Step to Execute" section is visible)

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a new Step 10 post-deployment smoke-test checklist (Markdown) covering landing page `/`, AuthGate + ApprovalGate access, all five portal detail routes, and opening the "Edit Links" dialog on each detail page for both an Admin and a non-admin approved Member; include places to record principals and entity IDs tested.
missing_requirements.reason: The new checklist file exists and includes fields to record principals and entity IDs, and it includes at least some route coverage (membership, publishing, release). But the file content is truncated before confirming it covers all five portal detail routes and explicitly includes steps to open the "Edit Links" dialog on each detail page for both roles (admin + non-admin member). The visible steps mention "Edit Links" button visibility, not dialog opening, and only show admin route testing section in the excerpt.
evidence: frontend/SMOKE_TEST_STEP_10_MAINNET.md (truncated; shows principals section and some routes, but not full five-route + dialog-opening coverage for both roles)

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `project_state.json` (projectStateVersion bumped and content updated) even though the BuildRequest only asked for rollout documentation/checklists changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested changes to `project_state.json`; this appears to be unrelated project metadata/state modification beyond the specified documentation tasks.
evidence: project_state.json (modified; shows projectStateVersion: 69 and other content)

hallucinated_features.description: Updated `frontend-file-summaries.txt` with extensive descriptions of frontend code hardening/normalization changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request updating this summary file; it only requests updating `frontend/ROLLOUT_STEPS.md` and adding a new Step 10 smoke test checklist markdown file.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (modified; includes descriptions of many frontend source files/behaviors)
